data.text: @GaryRabine Don’t forget one was re-elected lol 😂 and the Illinois sheep will probably re-elect the other two as well 🤡🤡

@Boogahlatooth @GaryRabine whatever little boy. Back to mommy's basement.

Get an education.

@hecht74 @GaryRabine *yawn* ok kid. 
And you suck at meme selection.
@Boogahlatooth @GaryRabine Like I said… you have nothing. Conversation and solutions are way above your comprehension level. https://t.co/QlGTJrKGVs

@hecht74 @GaryRabine If you're going to blame inanimate objects as the reason there are people murdered, you've just lost any and all credibility, so we'll stop there. I have never in my life seen a gun get up on its own and blast someone who disrespected it on facebook post or over a drug corner.

@GaryRabine Again, what benefit is it to anyone to go “Woke” on beliefs or policies?  There isn’t a single honest, factual thing anyone can name that being woke turned into a positive thing. What a joke. When will voters realize Democrats don’t care about you or your safety.
@GaryRabine The logical conclusion is that he wants to get rid of democracy. I'm not brushing aside deaths. But you're not talking about democracy.
@GaryRabine So what have those in “power” done to reduce shootings and homicides? Forget political party, what has this combination of leaders done? Let’s start there.
@GaryRabine What is the policy to stop the shootings. Be specific

@Boogahlatooth @GaryRabine GOP has no policies to fix anything… just out to scare people.

Unfortunately, people don’t want to hear/deal with root causes, they just scream and pound the table. Why? Because those who do, have nothing else to offer.
